official_title: Testing the Efficacy of an EHealth Decision Support Tool to Help Latinx Cancer Patients Make Informed Decisions About Tumor Genomic Testing
inclusion_criteria:
Self-identified Latinx patients who:

1. diagnosed with solid tumor cancers
2. speak/read English or Spanish;
3. can provide informed consent.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria: Patients with hematologic/liquid cancers (leukemia, lymphoma, multiple myeloma, etc.)
